elements.text: You're enjoying a quiet evening at home with your partner when you notice that you're having difficulty letting go of a small disagreement. You worry that it is putting strain on your relationship. You remind yourself that if you express your worries, your partner will respond with...

elements.name: Minor Disagreement_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
